title: Wrong horizontal interpolation in remapping for soil type related variables (r1i1p1f1 republish)
description:
The soil type related variables in EC-Earth3 which have been cmorised with an ece2cmor3 version earlier than v1.7 have been produced without a nearest neighbor interpolation which is required because of different soil types in the horizontal direction. The r1i1p1f1 files will be unpublished, fixed, and a new v20210324 version will be published.
Affected variables: mrfso,mrso,mrsol,mrsos,mrsow,clayfrac,sandfrac,siltfrac
